MainGoal.control_action: enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems based on information flow control policies
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-4 AC-4 Main Main: information system enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between connected systems based on information flow control policies; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(appAuth),val(infoSys)]; aw = 0.7333333333333334

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: provides confidence value based on user request assessment
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: AC-4 Req1: security compliance confidence assessment process maintains provides confidence value based on user request assessment; aw = 0.7333333333333334

OppGoal.statement: Goal: M1 G-1: Variables = numOfReq; Condition = greater than 3; aw = 0.2
Goal: M1 G-2: Variables = authUser; Condition = authorized credential; aw = 1
Goal: M1 G-3: Variables = newUser; Condition = false; aw = 1.0

Strategy.statement: Strategy: S1: Argument over security compliance confidence assessment process
